description.originalText:
I recently turned to Care.com in search of additional support for my sister, who has been battling multiple sclerosis for years. As my mother, who has been a primary caregiver, is getting older, the need for external help became crucial. Among the numerous responses to my advertisement, Andrea, a local professional, stood out. 

Hiring Andrea has been a transformative experience for our family. She possesses a remarkably kind and gentle demeanor, which has greatly endeared her to my sister. Not only does she provide excellent care, but she also offers invaluable companionship, always being there to support and engage with my sister. Her flexible schedule has been a significant advantage, accommodating our unique needs with ease. 

In just a few weeks, Andrea has become more than a caregiver; she feels like a part of our family. Her extraordinary dedication and compassion have left us immensely impressed. For those residing in Union County seeking dependable and heartfelt home healthcare services, I wholeheartedly recommend Andrea. Her impact on our lives has been nothing short of a blessing.
